text:
@Lrihendry Is it the same counting system used for COVID-19 deaths?
If it appears to "look" like COVID, it is COVID.
Fortunately as of 6/20/20, CDC reports there are more deaths due to the flu than COVID-19!  
# deaths flu or COVID-19: 1,574
# deaths COVID-19: 481
https://t.co/ZoJCRCy1Lv
